chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
naetli: no_append_entries_to_leader_interface
naetsi: no_append_entries_to_self_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
laei: log_all_entries_interface
aelli: append_entries_leaderLogs_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
mili: match_index_leader_interface
matchisi: match_index_sanity_interface
aersi: append_entries_reply_sublog_interface
cei: candidate_entries_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface

Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (f : name -> A * B) (x : name) (v2 : B) (y : name), fst (update name_eq_dec f x (fst (f x), v2) y) = fst (f y)

Premises:
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface naetli : no_append_entries_to_leader_interface naetsi : no_append_entries_to_self_interface taifoli : terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface rlmli : refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface laei : log_all_entries_interface aelli : append_entries_leaderLogs_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface lhllsi : leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface ollpti : one_leaderLog_per_term_interface mili : match_index_leader_interface matchisi : match_index_sanity_interface a
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
update_fun_comm : forall (A B C : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (f : B -> C) (st : A -> B) (y : A) (v : B) (x : A), f (update A_eq_dec st y v x) = update A_eq_dec (fun x0 : A => f (st x0)) y (f v) x
update_diff : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x : A) (v : B) (y : A), x <> y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = sigma y
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
argmax_elim : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A) (a : A), argmax f l = Some a -> In a l /\ (forall x : A, In x l -> f a >= f x)
update_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x y : A) (v : B), x = y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = v
argmax_None : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A), argmax f l = None -> l = []
argmax_fun_ext : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> nat) (l : list A), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> argmax f l = argmax g l
argmax_one_different : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (f g : A -> nat) (l : list A) (a : A), (forall x : A, In x l -> a <> x -> f x = g x) -> (forall x : A, In x l -> f x <= g x) -> argmax g l = argmax f l \/ argmax g l = Some a
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
argmax = fix argmax (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A) {struct l} : option A := match l with | [] => None | a :: l' => match argmax A f l' with | Some a' => if f a' <=? f a then Some a else Some a' | None => Some a end end : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> list A -> option A Arguments argmax {A}%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope
allEntries_update_timeout : forall (x : term * entry) (h : Net.name) (h' : name) (net : network) (d : data), In x (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) -> In x (allEntries (fst (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h' (update_elections_data_timeout h' (nwState net h'), d) h)))
map_fst_snd_id : forall (A B : Type) (l : list (A * B)), map (fun t : A * B => (fst t, snd t)) l = l
surjective_pairing : forall (A B : Type) (p : A * B), p = (fst p, snd p)
dedup_In : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), In x xs -> In x (dedup A_eq_dec xs)
in_dedup_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (x : A), In x (dedup A_eq_dec xs) -> In x xs
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B Arguments prod (_ _)%type_scope Arguments pair {A B}%type_scope
map_id : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), map (fun x : A => x) l = l
update_elections_data_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) => let '(_, st', _) := handleTimeout me (snd st) in match votedFor st' with | Some cid => if serverType_eq_dec (type (snd st)) Leader then fst st else {| votes := (currentTerm st', cid) :: votes (fst st); votesWithLog := (currentTerm st', cid, log st') :: votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := if serverType_eq_dec (type st') Candidate then fun tm : term => if Nat.eq_dec tm (currentTerm st') then votesReceived st' else cronies (fst st) tm else cronies (fst st); leaderLogs := leaderLogs (fst st); allEntries := allEntries (fst st) |} | None => fst st end : forall...
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
fold_left : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> A) -> list B -> A -> A
doLeader_appliedEntries : forall (sigma : name -> raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader (sigma h) h = (os, st', ms) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') = applied_entries sigma
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
NoDup_dedup : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A), NoDup (dedup A_eq_dec xs)
update_elections_data_requestVoteReply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (t : nat) (voteGranted : bool) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => let st' := handleRequestVoteReply me (snd st) src t voteGranted in match type st' with | Follower => fst st | Candidate => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := fun tm : term => if Nat.eq_dec tm (currentTerm st') then votesReceived st' else cronies (fst st) tm; leaderLogs := leaderLogs (fst st); allEntries := allEntries (fst st) |} | Leader => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies :=...
applied_entries_update : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), lastApplied st >= lastApplied (sigma h) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma /\ (exists h' : name, argmax (fun h0 : name => lastApplied (sigma h0)) (all_fin N) = Some h' /\ lastApplied (sigma h') >= lastApplied st) \/ argmax (fun h' : name => lastApplied (update name_eq_dec sigma h st h')) (all_fin N) = Some h /\ applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = rev (removeAfterIndex (log st) (lastApplied st))
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : Net.name) (ps : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) => map (fun m : Net.name * Net.msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), Net.name -> list (Net.name * Net.msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
cronies_votes = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (t : term) (candidate : Net.name) (crony : name), In crony (cronies (fst (nwState net candidate)) t) -> In (t, candidate) (votes (fst (nwState net crony))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments cronies_votes {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
applied_entries_log_lastApplied_update_same : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), log st = log (sigma h) -> lastApplied st = lastApplied (sigma h) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

```coq
intros A B f x v2 y.
unfold update.
destruct (name_eq_dec x y) as [eq_xy | neq_xy].
- rewrite eq_xy. simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. reflexivity.
Qed.

original: intros A B f x v2 y. unfold update. destruct (name_eq_dec x y) as [eq_xy | neq_xy]. - rewrite eq_xy. simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. reflexivity.
